roleset.name: make sharp
roleset.note: HONE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hone' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from hone.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive with instrument
example.text: But some cosmetics-industry executives wonder whether techniques-1 honed [*]-1 in packaged goods will translate to the cosmetics business.

example.name: active, agentive
example.text: [Japanese researchers]-1 have bred dozens of strains of Fujis [*-1]to hone its color, taste and shelf life.
example.arg: its color, taste and shelf life
